en.name: Nowhere to Run
en.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by {{24//30//36//42//48%}}. Whenever the wearer defeats an enemy, they restore HP equal to {{12//15//18//21//24%}} of their ATK.

zh.name: 无处可逃
zh.description: 使装备者的攻击力提高{{24//30//36//42//48%}}。当装备者消灭敌方目标时，回复等同于自身{{12//15//18//21//24%}}攻击力的生命值。
